entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:50 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
